context.arch.widget
Class ClassifierWidget

java.lang.Object
  context.arch.BaseObject
      context.arch.widget.Widget
          context.arch.widget.ClassifierWidget
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommunicationsHandler, MessageHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccelerometerWidget, AutostatusWidget
public class ClassifierWidget
extends Widget

Extends Widget to provide capabilities for reading non-constant Attributes from a WEKA .arff file. It assumes that the last feature is the class feature and does NOT add it.

instanceToAttributes

public static Attributes instanceToAttributes(weka.core.Instance instance)
Convenience method to extract Attributes from a WEKA instance. It does not include the last weka attribute that is assumed to be the class attribute.
